definitions.description: An automated payment system whereby an account holder authorizes a creditor to debit the customer's bank account at regular intervals.

constantValues: An automated payment system whereby an account holder authorizes a creditor to debit the customer's bank account at regular intervals.

members.name: fi_DirectDebitId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances.

members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: creditorname
members.description: The creditor to whom the direct debit is made from customer's account (such as automatic payments to a utility company).

constantValues: The creditor to whom the direct debit is made from customer's account (such as automatic payments to a utility company).

members.name: debtoraccount
members.description: Account number from which a direct debit is executed for a payment or standing order.

constantValues: Account number from which a direct debit is executed for a payment or standing order.
